'''Black Lightning''' is a unique form of [[Lightning Release]] utilised by the [[Third Raikage]], who passed it on to [[Darui]] alone.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 526, pages 8-9</ref> Not much is known about it, but as the name suggests, the lightning produced is black in colour.

== Trivia ==
* Both users have the stylised kanji for {{translation|"lightning"|雷|kaminari}} tattooed on their shoulders; Darui on his left and the Third on his right. This seems to be a distinctive tradition, as [[Ginkaku]] and [[Kinkaku]] recognised [[Darui]]'s possession of this ability through his tattoo.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 526, page 17</ref>
* [[Sasuke Uchiha]] demonstrated the ability to use [[Chidori#Cursed Seal of Heaven Application|something]] resembling this when he fought against [[Naruto Uzumaki]] at the [[Valley of the End]] in Part I,<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 232, page 11</ref> and when he [[Chidori#Six Paths Application|attacked]] [[Madara Uchiha]] in the [[Fourth Shinobi World War]] after receiving [[Hagoromo Ōtsutsuki]]'s power.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 674, page 11</ref>
* [[Kakashi Hatake]]'s [[Lightning Cutter|lightning attack]] also became [[Kamui Lightning Cutter|black in colour]] after receiving the [[Six Paths Power]] from [[Obito Uchiha]] while battling against [[Kaguya Ōtsutsuki]] in the Fourth Shinobi World War.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 689, page 9</ref>
* In the anime, [[Tsukiyo]] has displayed Lightning Release similar in appearance to this, though his has a magenta glow.<ref>''Boruto'' episode 146</ref>
